name: Survivor Rodger Multiple Choice Quiz | Survivors | 10 Questions

questions.text: What two people were Rodger standing beside, when they all had their picture taking in front of the plane?
How old was Rodger while he was on the island?
questions.explanation:
none of these.

	This is a trick question because Rodger was never on an island, he was in the outback.

Kentucky.

	He lives in the city of Crittenden, Kentucky.

questions.text: How did Rodger spell Debb's name when he voted for her?
questions.explanation:
Debb.

	Kimmi and Elisabeth were the only people to spell it with one 'B'.

questions.text: What is Rodger's favourite band, or singer?

questions.explanation:
Tom Hanks.

	His favourite movie starring Tom Hanks is Forrest Gump.

questions.text: Rodger holds a high school record for most _______ in a basketball game?
How much did the hamburger cost, that Rodger bought at the Survivor Auction?
questions.explanation:
$320.

	It was the only thing he bought at the auction.

questions.text: What did Debb call Rodger on day 1?
Who did Rodger vote for to win the game. Colby or Tina?
questions.explanation:
Colby & colby.

	He said Colby played the game better than Tina and he deserved the money.
